ygData.subject: RE: Trade Skills (OT?)
ygData.msgSnippet: The spit is a portable oven. I have only tried and failed on my first bear meat sammich. If you wanna try brewing, bog juice (water and snake scales combine in
ygData.messageBody:
The spit is a portable oven. I have only tried and failed on my first bear
meat sammich.

If you wanna try brewing, bog juice (water and snake scales combine in brew
barrel) is supposed to be real easy. I made some first time. Wonder if you
can drink it? I need it to give to some guy in west karana for his
bandages.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
[mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 9:02 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Trade Skills (OT?)

From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

In baking, can any meat be mixed with bread to make
sandwhiches? Is a spit
sort of like a portable oven? I've purchased the first
delicicies book and
just can't imagine buying 10 baking books for recipies.
